extendedInfo.description: Cubezzle is a puzzle and brain training game, where you need to organize mixed puzzle pieces into a set of cubes.  The order is determined by the geometric shapes and colors of the cubes. The pieces slide horizontally and vertically, dragging along with each movement, the row of cube pieces.There are four levels of difficulty depending on the number of rows and columns of the matrix: 3x3, 4x4, 5x5 and 6x6. This version only have 3x3 mode.At the end of the game, when the puzzle is completed, your time and number of movements is recorded in order to keep the best times.You can compete online with other players from all over the world and know what your position is in the ranking for each category. The shorter time and lesser movements it takes you to complete the puzzle, the higher your position in the World Ranking will be.

reviews.title: Problem
reviews.comment: The squares won\'t scroll vertically on my device, only horizontally, unusable.
reviews.author: Tim Thompson

reviews.title: Looks like it could be fun, but I just don\'t get it.
reviews.comment: I\'m sure that once I \'get\' what I\'m supposed to do, it\'ll be a great little game. however, as the help and the store video does not help at all I\'ll probably uninstall it from frustration. First time user help MUST be drastically improved.
reviews.author: Tim Owers

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Not a bad game, but the font is near impossible to read and there should be an option to remove the haptic feedback when moving the puzzle pieces. I\'ll keep it since it was installed for free from appgratis, but it\'s a little rough around the edges so I wouldn\'t pay for it
reviews.author: Krystal Walker

reviews.title: How to play.
reviews.comment: Press the template button on the bottom right this hides the cubes, The aim is to make all the cubes match the colors on the floor and walls, white to white orange to orange green to green etc,The walls and floor don\'t change only the cubes do,hope this helps its hard to explain.Great game once you no how to play.good job dev/devs edit: Please write changelog in app description cheers.
reviews.author: Jay M
